title: Medieval African Kingdoms and Trade Networks

vocab.definition: A wealthy West African kingdom known for gold and salt trade
A famous ruler of Mali known for his wealth and pilgrimage
Trade routes across the Sahara Desert
An important trading city and center of learning in Africa
A group of traders traveling together for safety

teachingNotes: Emphasize the wealth and sophistication of African kingdoms. Discuss how trade connected Africa to the wider world.

sample.question: What was a wealthy West African kingdom known for gold trade?
